name: Paul Moose In Space World
description:
Paul Moose voyages through outer space with his appliances in the search for alien life.

A short adventure game made for a game jam in August 2009. Made in Adventure Game Studio. All music by Raymond Scott. As of 2022, it runs best in compatability mode for Windows XP.

CONTROLS:

Left click - walk

Right click - open verb coin

Esc - menu

Fullscreen can be toggled in the file winsetup.exe.
